summary: Fluttershy instead of plain horse, still no blink animation, have problems with skeleton
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds fluttershy instead of horse, enjoy
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I\'ve got this nice model of pony from deviantart and just changed mesh a bit - http://kp-shadowsquirrel.deviantart.com/art/Pony-Model-Download-Center-215266264
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here\'s gameplay http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=puTE5wQ5kOE
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here\'s Princess Luna http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6569
Here\'s Applejack and Pinkie Pie http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6817
Here\'s Derpy and Dash http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6436
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to install? Just put textures and meshes folders to Data folder in folder with Skyrim dawg
author: zdzichorowerzysta
